name: closefriend
text: I can't tell if I love or hate that the train taking Ray and Butters out of Mexico happens to be invisible, but at least this means we don't get to see the post-menopausal real estate agents (any more than you see in real life).

name: catachresis
text:
Damn. Ray has the idea of post-menopausal real-estate agents, and then Lonis just conjures it out of the air, like he is reading his thoughts, except he did it before Ray even arrived?
And I thought Heroes fucked with my mind about time-travel.

name: redjoker
text: I'd say the way your mind dresses, it asks for it.

name: untilyouaresonude
text: Ray judges people's worth based on what albums they've purchased recently.

name: junko
text: Also, "Rumours" is a spot-on choice for the favorite of a menopausal real-estate agent.

name: thesyndicate88
text: Agreed. It works on so many levels. One, it's 30 years old. Two, the Greatest break-up album ever goes perfect with post-menopausal real-estate agents. haha

name: boredom_man
text: Why, how many post-menopausal real-estate agents have you broken up with?

name: thesyndicate88
text: Oh boredom_man, if you only knew *wistful glance off into the distance*

name: ham_shoes
text: I was thinking maybe something by Bruce Hornsby & the Range would work better, but hey, maybe someday I change

name: dusty
text:
Weird Al Yancovic - The food album
Ray would be forced to decapitate me with a scimitar on sight.

name: cicadalek
text: I love the term 'personal Christmas party' . Makes it sound slightly less lame to be home by yourself.

name: sargasm
text: KUNKchunkachunkaCHUNKAchunk

name: riazm
text: Many times I have attempted to amplify the sexual appearance of my trousers, always meeting with failure.

name: aliiis
text: Is that... is that a visible wang outline in panel 2? I guess that constitutes some of the amplified sexual appearance? Is there a word for wang outline? I feel sure there is, but cannot bring it to mind.

name: fattypneumonia
text: ummmmm... rockhardcatcock?

name: caduceo
text: A comment left by caduceo was marked lame too many times and excluded. name: pohlhoud
text:
This arc is really great man. Retract.

Retract.

name: tagrineth
text: How on Earth does lack of a caboose ... nevermind

name: saint
text: I hope it was worth it

name: tombsgrave
text: ...I really, really like this arc.  Sue me.  Or, alternately, lame me.

name: cdl146
text: I'm not exactly sure what I think of it. It's very odd, but it kept me interested. I suppose if I want a comic where the characters do the same damn thing every strip I could always go read Garfield...

name: sharktastic
text: Well said!

name: i_love_kate
text: I love how obvious it is that the single lame that this comment recieved was Caduceo's.

name: breadcrab
text: They can call me mad, but they can't call me lame! Not with millions of fingers on the trigger!

name: mckayle
text: That KA-CHUNK just kills me.

name: k_buttsworthe
text: he drinks singapore slings. that is class in a glass.

name: fosters
text: I think it goes without saying that Lonis paid dearly for that caboose.

text: HEY-O

name: adult_beverages
text:
